verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H2088>"This<s%> shall be the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H6879>leper<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%> Now he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> Thus the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and <S%H2009>if<s%> the <S%H5061>infection<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> has been <S%H7495>healed<s%> in the <S%H6879>leper,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>give<s%> <S%H6680>orders<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and a <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9641>string<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop<s%> for the one who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall also <S%H6680>give<s%> <S%H6680>orders<s%> to <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"[As for] the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it, together with the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9641>string<s%> and the <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> them and the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> that was <S%H7819>slain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"He shall then <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> the one who is to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from the <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> and shall <S%H2891>pronounce<s%> him <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and shall let the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H7971>free<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%>

"The one to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> shall then <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H1548>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> Now <S%H310>afterward,<s%> he may <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> but he shall <S%H3427>stay<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"And it will be on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H1548>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair:<s%> he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H2206>beard<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyebrows,<s%> <S%H1354><s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8181>hair.<s%> He shall then <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

"Now on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> and a <S%H8141>yearling<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lamb<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> and three-tenths [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H2891>pronounces<s%> him <S%H2891>clean<s%> shall <S%H5975>present<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> and the aforesaid <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> and <S%H7126>bring<s%> it for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> with the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H5130>present<s%> them as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Next he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> – for the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> like the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> belongs to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> [it] into his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>palm;<s%>

the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H2881>dip<s%> his right-hand <S%H676>finger<s%> into the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>palm,<s%> and with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And of the <S%H3499>remaining<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in his <S%H3709>palm,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> on the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%>

while the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H3709>palm,<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed.<s%> So the priest shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall next <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from his <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%> Then <S%H310>afterward,<s%> he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

"And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> up the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> Thus the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and he shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> he is <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>means<s%> are <S%H5381>insufficient,<s%> then he is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> as a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and one-tenth [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and a <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%>

and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5381>within<s%> his <S%H3027>means,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> shall be a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

"Then the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them for his <S%H2893>cleansing<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering,<s%> and the <S%H3849>log<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Next he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall also <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> into his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>palm;<s%>

and with his right-hand <S%H676>finger<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3709>palm<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>palm<s%> on the <S%H8571>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot,<s%> on the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

"Moreover, the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H8081>oil<s%> that is in the priest's <S%H3709>palm<s%> he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on his <S%H5921>behalf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"He shall then <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5381>within<s%> his <S%H3027>means.<s%>

"[He shall offer] <S%H834>what<s%> he can <S%H5381>afford,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H5921>together<s%> with the grain <S%H4503>offering.<s%> So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on <S%H5921>behalf<s%> of the one to be <S%H2891>cleansed.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> [for him] in <S%H834>whom<s%> there is an <S%H5061>infection<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>means<s%> are <S%H5381>limited<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing.<s%>"
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> further <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> you for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5061>mark<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> on a <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession,<s%>

then the one <S%H834>who<s%> owns the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> '[Something] like a <S%H5061>mark<s%> [of leprosy] has <S%H7200>become<s%> <S%H7200>visible<s%> to me in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>'

"The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H6680>order<s%> that they <S%H6437>empty<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> in to <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H5061>mark,<s%> so that <S%H3605>everything<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> need not <S%H2930>become<s%> <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"So he shall <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H5061>mark,<s%> and <S%H2009>if<s%> the <S%H5061>mark<s%> on the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> has <S%H3422>greenish<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> <S%H8258>depressions,<s%> and <S%H4758>appears<s%> <S%H8217>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7023>surface;<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway,<s%> and <S%H5462>quarantine<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H7200>make<s%> an <S%H7200>inspection.<s%> <S%H2009>If<s%> the <S%H5061>mark<s%> has <S%H2009>indeed<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6680>order<s%> them to <S%H2502>tear<s%> out the <S%H68>stones<s%> with the <S%H5061>mark<s%> in them and <S%H7993>throw<s%> them <S%H7993>away<s%> at an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"And he shall have the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7106>scraped<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H4480>inside,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and they shall <S%H8210>dump<s%> the <S%H6083>plaster<s%> that they <S%H7096>scrape<s%> <S%H7096>off<s%> at an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"Then they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H8478>replace<s%> <S%H935><s%> [those] <S%H68>stones;<s%> and he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6083>plaster<s%> and <S%H2902>replaster<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H518>"If,<s%> however, the <S%H5061>mark<s%> <S%H9457>breaks<s%> out <S%H7725>again<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H2502>torn<s%> out the <S%H68>stones<s%> and <S%H7096>scraped<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> it has been <S%H2902>replastered,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in and <S%H7200>make<s%> an <S%H7200>inspection.<s%> <S%H2009>If<s%> he <S%H2009>sees<s%> that the <S%H5061>mark<s%> has <S%H2009>indeed<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> it is a <S%H3992>malignant<s%> <S%H6883>mark<s%> in the <S%H1004>house;<s%> it is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

"He shall therefore <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> its <S%H68>stones,<s%> and its <S%H6086>timbers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6083>plaster<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he shall <S%H3318>take<s%> [them] <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> to an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"Moreover, whoever <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3605>during<s%> the <S%H3117>time<s%> that he has <S%H5462>quarantined<s%> it, <S%H2930>becomes<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

"Likewise, whoever <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

<S%H518>"If,<s%> on the other hand, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> in and <S%H7200>makes<s%> an <S%H7200>inspection,<s%> and the <S%H5061>mark<s%> has not <S%H2009>indeed<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> has been <S%H2902>replastered,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2891>pronounce<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2891>clean<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5061>mark<s%> has not <S%H7495>reappeared.<s%>

"To <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> then, he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and a <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9641>string<s%> and <S%H231>hyssop,<s%>
and he shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthenware<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"Then he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and the <S%H231>hyssop<s%> and the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9641>string,<s%> with the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> them in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7819>slain<s%> <S%H6833>bird,<s%> as well as in the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

"He shall thus <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird<s%> and with the <S%H2416>running<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> along with the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> and with the <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and with the <S%H231>hyssop<s%> and with the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H9641>string.<s%>

"However, he shall let the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H7971>free<s%> <S%H413>outside<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%> So he shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>"
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5061>mark<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> – even for a <S%H5424>scale,<s%>
and for the <S%H6883>leprous<s%> <S%H899>garment<s%> or <S%H1004>house,<s%>
and for a <S%H7613>swelling,<s%> and for a <S%H5597>scab,<s%> and for a <S%H934>bright<s%> <S%H934>spot<s%> –
to <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> they are <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H3117>when<s%> they are <S%H2889>clean.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>
